meanings.definition: The quality of being outstandingly bad or shocking.
meanings.sent1: The egregiousness of the crime left everyone in disbelief.
meanings.sent2: Her behavior was a clear example of egregiousness.
meanings.sent3: The egregiousness of the situation was so absurd, it almost seemed comical.
meanings.sent4: The egregiousness of the mistake was like a dark cloud hanging over the project.
meanings.sent5: The egregiousness of the violation was etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: The act of being remarkably bad or shocking.
meanings.sent1: The team was shocked by the egregiousness of his actions.
meanings.sent2: The egregiousness of the decision was evident to all.
meanings.sent3: His egregiousness in always arriving late became a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The egregiousness of the betrayal felt like a stab in the back.
meanings.sent5: The egregiousness of the situation was like a slap in the face.
